/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims based on exposure to specific environmental or military occupational hazards, including
end product (EP) control and tracking for environmental and military occupational hazard claims
action to take when the Veteran claims environmental or military occupational hazards exposure but does not claim a disability
verifying environmental or military occupational hazard exposure
, and
what to include in medical opinion requests in environmental or military occupational hazard claims
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B - Processing Claims Based on Exposure to Specific Environmental or Military Occupational Hazards
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B
